item.title: Memes about me, memes, and stuff I love. Mostly memes.
item.description:
You do, don’t you?
I’m really good at it, too.
No previews
In my case it is a 30’ tall Christmas light putter upper. It replaces my old strip of plywood with a V notched into the top that said “Shaq + 11 or 1.5432 Scarlett Johanssons” on it.
And more Amazon delivers inside my garage.
And my dad jokes.
Stop it.
1,434 are rookie numbers. Need to punch those up.
#Science
True.
#SleepyDon
Bring it, ladies. It’s New Year’s Eve and I don’t have a date.
item.dc:creator: Wheretheheckisjason

item.title: Gaming Dump to Ring In The New Year + GAME OF THE MONTH CLUB MONTH 5!
item.description:
DIE MONSTER! YOU DON’T BELONG IN THIS WORLD!
Never got into Sonic X because of the human characters tbh
It’s the beginning of the end for enthusiast PC builders. Thanks Nvidia.
I 100%’d Prime 4, and I gotta say, the supporting cast aren’t horrible, but it definitely makes it feel less like Metroid.
Can’t stand that he’s got the colours reversed.
And with that: AN INVITATION! We’ve been doing the Game of the Month club over on my discord for 5 months now! It’s been a lot of fun! This month I wanted to try to pay it forward a little bit and have us play a game developed by an Imgurite! So the game of the month for January is: Cauldron, developed by Imgur’s own @PeterRegg! It’s a minigame-centric RPG with cute art and snappy mechanics! Disclaimer because I know someone really fun on this website will accuse us of shilling: The developer was not aware did not contact me about this or otherwise pay or ask us to do this. I just want to show support for small devs and noticed an opportunity to do so! If this sounds like something you’d be interested in, by all means jump into the NoGameOvers Discord server, where we have a great little community of Imgurite gamers and gamers from all walks of life! Hope to see you there! And thanks for making a cool game @PeterRegg!! https://discord.gg/nacwBbWDXu
item.dc:creator: NoGameOvers

item.title: Lumpfishes
item.description: Cyclopterus refers to the lumpfish (Cyclopterus lumpus), a unique, ball-shaped marine fish known for its suction-cup-like pelvic fins, which it uses to cling to surfaces in cold North Atlantic waters. It has a lumpy body, a high dorsal crest, and changes color dramatically, especially during breeding season when males turn bright red or orange and females blue-green. The fish is valued for its roe, often sold as a caviar substitute, and is also known by many other names like lumpsucker or henfish. Key Characteristics Appearance: Round, lumpy body with three rows of bony protrusions on its sides; pelvic fins form a suction disc; males have larger heads and pectoral fins than females. Color: Highly variable (blue, gray, olive, brown); breeding males become orange-red, while females turn blue-green. Size: Females are generally larger, reaching up to 24 inches, while males are smaller. Habitat: Cold waters of the North Atlantic and Arctic, from the seafloor to among seaweed; juveniles live in seaweed beds, adults move to deeper water. Diet: Jellyfish, small crustaceans, worms, and small fish. Very beautiful and very powerful

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @Vgirl78ful did this cross-stitch for their grandmother. Good work.
27 Man Tax: Gary Barlow
“I think, with never-ending gratitude, that the young women of today do not and can never know at what price their right to free speech and to speak at all in public has been earned.” - Lucy Stone I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me! Happy New Year!
item.dc:creator: MemeMuseumCurator

item.title: Please say hello to Biscuit! He was abandoned and I found him.
item.description:
I found this little guy down by the river at my work, a colleague helped me trap him and brought him to the Delta Community Animal Shelter. They looked after him and made sure nobody was missing him (no chip or tat).
I visited him every other day to see how he was doing and my wife accepted that we had been chosen by the cat distribution system again.
We think he's a Flame Point Siamese due to the color and blue eyes.
Making himself at home, had to keep Biscuit and Smudge separated for a couple days.
They became buddies after the first week.
Now they play together and follow each other around the house. The best part? Double snugs! I want to give a shout out to the folks at DCAS for taking such good care of him and their other animals. Please visit their website if you get a chance. Delta Community Animal Shelter | City of Delta https://share.google/1qgs1Y25lky2P8ueP
item.dc:creator: steve1378
